# PostMint üìù

**PostMint** enables writers to publish their content on-chain using the **Zora protocol**.

![Image of UI](./public/ui.png)

> You can check the code for backend here - [https://github.com/ashishbhintade/postmint-backend](https://github.com/ashishbhintade/postmint-backend)

[![Built on Base](https://img.shields.io/badge/Built%20on-BaseSepolia-0052FF?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://base.org)
[![Built with Zora](https://img.shields.io/badge/Built%20with-Zora-000000?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://zora.co)

## ‚ú® Features

- Publish content directly on-chain via the **Zora Protocol**
- Store post data on **IPFS** using **Pi√±ata**
- Minimal, elegant UI built with **Next.js** and **shadcn**
- Seamless wallet-based authentication and interaction
- End-to-end decentralization ‚Äî content lives on **IPFS** and **Base**

## üõ† Tech Stack Used

### Frontend

- **Next.js 15**, **TypeScript**
- **Tailwind CSS**, **Shadcn UI**

### Web3

- **Zora Coins SDK** ‚Äì create/mint coins
- **Viem** ‚Äì wallet interactions

### Storage

- **Pi√±ata** ‚Äì IPFS-based storage
- **Turso** ‚Äì edge database for metadata

## Architecture

### API Routes

- GET `/api/posts` ‚Äì Fetch all posts
- GET `/api/post` ‚Äì Get post by CID
- POST `/api/upload` ‚Äì Upload post data to IPFS
- POST `/api/coin-details` ‚Äì Create CID and map to user address

### Account Management

- useWalletConnection (`/hooks/useWalletConnection.tsx`) ‚Äì Manages wallet connection, account, and network changes

### Data Flow

1. User enters post title and content
2. Data is uploaded to IPFS ‚Üí generates a CID
3. Metadata with Preview Image and Content CID is uploaded to IPFS
4. Metadata CID is used in `createCoin` method to mint a Zora coin
5. Coin metadata is saved and linked to the user's address

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. Writer connects their crypto wallet
2. Writes and formats content using a rich text editor
3. Content is uploaded to **IPFS** via **Pi√±ata**
4. Post is minted on-chain using **Zora SDK**
5. Posts can be viewed through the UI or directly via IPFS

## Zora Integration üåü

PostMint uses **Zora's Coins SDK** to mint posts as coins on **Base**

### Code Implementation

```ts
import { createCoin, DeployCurrency } from "@zoralabs/coins-sdk";

const coinParams = {
  name: title,
  symbol,
  uri,
  payoutRecipient: account as Address,
  platformReferrer: account as Address,
  chainId: baseSepolia.id,
  currency: DeployCurrency.ETH,
};

const result = await createCoin(coinParams, walletClient, publicClient, {
  gasMultiplier: 120,
});
```

## ‚òÅÔ∏è Hosted On

- **Frontend** ‚Äì Vercel
- **Backend** ‚Äì Render
